archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Identify Loyalty Program Abuse
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Identify and report possible loyalty program abuse.

properties.value: Identify Loyalty Program Abuse identifies and reports possible loyalty program abuse. For example, a loyalty program member may repeatedly earn currency, redeem currency, and then return the offering(s) used to earn currency. Possible abuse may be communicated to Initiate Leaving Loyalty Program.
